column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Sokka says : " That Hama seems a little strange .
#Text=She 's a nice woman who took us in and gave us a place to stay .
#Text=She kinda reminds me of Gran - Gran .
#Text=" Sokka says : " But what did she mean by that comment , " mysterious children " ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Gee , I do n't know .
#Text=Maybe because she found four strange kids camping in the woods at night ?
#Text=Is n't that a little mysterious ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " I 'm gon na take a look around .
#Text=" Katara says : " Sokka !
#Text=Sokka , what are you doing ?
#Text=You ca n't just snoop around someone 's house .
#Text=" Sokka says : " It 'll be fine .
#Text=" Aang says : " She could be home any minute .
#Text=" Katara says : " Sokka , you 're gon na get us all in trouble and this is just plain rude !
#Text=" Sokka says : " I 'm not finished yet .
#Text=Come on ... " Aang says : " Okay , that 's pretty creepy .
#Text=" Katara says : " So she 's got a hobby .
#Text=There 's nothing weird about that .
#Text=Sokka , you 've looked enough .
#Text=Hama will be back soon .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Just an ordinary puppet - loving innkeeper , huh ?
#Text=Well then why does she have a locked door up here ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Probably to keep people like you from snooping through her stuff !
#Text=" Sokka says : " We 'll see .
#Text=It 's empty , except for a little chest .
#Text=" Toph says : " Maybe it 's treasure !
#Text=" Katara says : " Sokka , what are you doing ?
#Text=You 're breaking into a private room !
#Text=" Sokka says : " I have to see what 's in there .
#Text=" Aang says : " We should n't be doing this .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Maybe there 's a key here somewhere ... " Toph says : " Ooh !
#Text=Hand it over !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Come on , come on !
#Text=" Toph says : " This is n't as easy as it looks !
#Text=" Aang says : " Guys , I do n't know about this ... " Katara says : " This is crazy !
#Text=I 'm leaving !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Suit yourself !
#Text=Do it , Toph !
#Text=" Hama says : " I 'll tell you what 's in the box .
#Text=" Sokka says : " An old comb ?
#Text=" Hama says : " It 's my greatest treasure .
#Text=It 's the last thing I own from growing up in the Southern Water Tribe .
#Text=" Katara says : " You 're from the Southern Water Tribe ?
#Text=" Hama says : " Just like you .
#Text=" Katara says : " How did you know ?
#Text=" Hama says : " I heard you talking around your campfire .
#Text=" Sokka says : " But why did n't you tell us ?
#Text=" Hama says : " I wanted to surprise you !
#Text=I bought all this food today so I could fix you a big Water Tribe dinner .
#Text=Of course , I ca n't get all the ingredients I need here , but ocean kumquats are a lot like sea prunes if you stew them long enough .
#Text=" Aang says : " Great ... " Katara says : " I knew I felt a bond with you right away .
#Text=" Sokka says : " And I knew you were keeping a secret , so I guess we 're both right .
#Text=But I 'm sorry we were sneaking around .
#Text=" Hama says : " Apology accepted .
#Text=Now , let 's get cooking !
#Text="
